Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Located within minutes from McCarran International Airport and the Las Vegas Strip

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The District at Green Valley Ranch provides a vibrant and diverse mix of shopping, dining, entertainment, residences and office space- all in an urban environment with a pedestrian friendly main street plaza and a beautiful central park. The project is located on South Green Valley Parkway and Interstate 215. The mixed use project
has direct access to the I-215 which provides a short commute to the McCarran International Airport and the entire Las Vegas Valley.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Prominent building signage facing the 215 beltway

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Available for sublease is a fully improved medical office suite ready for immediate occupancy. Great condition that was only occupied by the former tenant for 18 months. Building signage is available fronting the 215 beltway. Ideal for a medical user looking for a shorter lease term.
Master lease expiration: 9/27/2023.
Suite 215: +/- 3,257 RSF / 2,869 USF.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Easy access to the I-215 freeway via Green Valley Parkway
Close proximity to McCarran International Airport and the Las Vegas Strip
Numerous amenities such as restaurants, banks and shopping

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 2200 Paseo Verde is conveniently located off the I-215 at Green Valley Parkway with close proximity to McCarran International Airport and the Las Vegas Strip. This prestigious location is surrounded by numerous amenities such as Green Valley Ranch Resort, Lucille’s Smokehouse Bar-B-Que, Rachel’s Kitchen, Panera Bread, Shake Shack and many more. 2200 Paseo Verde also enjoys many services minutes away from the property such as an AT&T Store, Whole Foods Market, multiple banks, Kroger Fuel and Great Clips.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Suite 160 is built out with a reception area, conference room, 11 offices, work room, IT/storage room and breakroom.
Suite 250 is built out with a reception area, conference room, 2 huddle rooms, 6 offices, work room, IT room, breakroom and small open area.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Class A office building consisting of approximately 68,332 SF
Offices with a view that will make you never want to leave
The convenience of nearby amenities such as shopping, restaurants, gyms, banks and gas stations
Parking ratio of approximately 4.5:1000, Covered Reserved Spaces are also available
Convenient access to the I-215 Beltway via Green Valley Parkway

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Green Valley is an upscale master planned community located in the ever-growing city of Henderson Nevada. Shoppers, food connoisseurs, gamers, sports fans and work-out buddies all meet to enjoy the vast amenities and conveniences in Green Valley Henderson. This expanding area is home to The District and Galleria at Sunset shopping malls, countless sit down dining and quick dip in & out restaurants and coffee shops, Green Valley Ranch Casino and Hotel, Lifetime Fitness, the new Silver Knights professional hockey team and the Las Vegas Raiders Intermountain Healthcare Performance Center.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Green Valley Corporate Center North encompasses this three-story professional Class A office building located in Southern Nevada’s first master-planned community. 2370 Corporate Circle was built in 2003 consisting of 68,332 square feet and delivers redundant state-of-the-art fiber optic capabilities in a corporate/professional setting.  Excellent signage opportunities exist fronting the I-215 Beltway.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Suite 110 is built out with a reception area, conference room, 3 offices, work/break room and open bullpen area.
Suite 220 is built out with a reception area, conference room, 6 offices, copy/work room and break room.
Suite 250 is built out with a reception area, conference room, 4 offices, copy room, breakroom and pen bullpen area.
Suite 280 is built out with a reception area, conference room, 4 offices, 2 executive offices, storage / IT room and break room.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Class A professional office building in a campus like environment can provide the capacity and flexibility to accommodate current and future company needs
Offices with a view that will make you want to come to work everyday
The convenience of nearby amenities such as shopping, restaurants, gyms, banks and gas stations
Parking ratio of approximately 4.4:1000, Covered Reserved Spaces available
Immediate access to the I-215 Beltway via Green Valley Parkway and minutes away from the I-15 and US-95.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Green Valley is an upscale master planned community located in the ever-growing city of Henderson Nevada. Shoppers, food connoisseurs, gamers, sports fans and work-out buddies all meet to enjoy the vast amenities and conveniences in Green Valley Henderson. This expanding area is home to The District and Galleria at Sunset shopping malls, countless sit down dining and quick dip in & out restaurants and coffee shops, Green Valley Ranch Casino and Hotel, Lifetime Fitness, the new Silver Knights professional hockey team and the Las Vegas Raiders Intermountain Healthcare Performance Center.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Green Valley Corporate Center North encompasses 2275 Corporate Circle – a three-story building constructed in 2000 consisting of 66,810 square feet, and 2285 Corporate Circle – a two-story building constructed in 2002 consisting of 45,473 square feet. These Class A professional office buildings are located in Southern Nevada’s first master-planned community and deliver redundant state-of-the-art fiber optic capabilities.  Outdoor seating surrounded by lush mature landscaping provides a peaceful place to refresh your mind.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Suite 100 is built out with a reception area, conference room, 6 offices, work room, storage room, IT room, break room and large open bullpen area.
Suite 150 is built out with a reception area, 2 offices, storage/IT room, break room and small open area.
Suite 230 is built out with a reception area, 2 offices, conference room and large open bullpen area.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Green Valley Corporate Center North encompasses 2285 Corporate Circle – a two-story building constructed in 2002 consisting of 45,473 square feet. This Class A professional office buildings are located in Southern Nevada’s first master-planned community and deliver redundant state-of-the-art fiber optic capabilities.  Outdoor seating surrounded by lush mature landscaping provides a peaceful place to refresh your mind.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Two-Story Professional Class "B" Building located within the prestigious Green Valley Corporate Center
Building Signage Opportunity with excellent visibility from the I-215 Beltway

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Green Valley Tech Park is located within Green Valley Corporate Center with direct access to the I-215 Beltway via Green Valley Parkway. These two buildings are surrounded by many amenities such as The District at Green Valley, Bank of America, Wells Fargo Bank, Nevada State Bank, Smiths, Smiths Fuel Center, Great Clips, F45 Training Henderson and Starbucks.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 2350 Corporate Circle is a 2 Two-Story Professional Office Building located in the prestigious Green Valley Corporate Center. This building totals ±46,457 SF and can provide an above standard 7 per 1,000 parking ratio. The property is situated along the I-215 Beltway granting both great visibility and expedient access to the entire Las Vegas Valley. This building also benefits from close proximity to one of the premier mixed-use projects in Henderson known as the District at Green Valley Ranch as well as McCarran International Airport and the Las Vegas Strip.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 46,457 SF of Office Space Available in Green Valley!

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Two-Story Building located within the prestigious Green Valley Corporate Center

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Tech Park VI has expedient access to the entire Las Vegas Valley via the I-215 Beltway. The property enjoys close proximity to many retail centers, restaurants, McCarran International Airport, and the University of Nevada Las Vegas (UNLV).

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Green Valley Tech Park VI consists of two 2-story buildings located at 2340 and 2350 Corporate Circle in the Green Valley Corporate Center. Constructed in 2001, Tech Park VI has expedient access to the entire Las Vegas Valley via the I-215 Beltway.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 15,539 SF of Office Space Available in Green Valley!

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Suite 100 is built out with a reception area, 2 huddle rooms, conference room, 6 offices, mail room, file room, IT room and large open bullpen area.

Outdoor seating surrounded by lush mature landscaping provides a peaceful place to refresh your mind. Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Suite 150 is built out with a reception area, conference room, private office, 9 class rooms, storage room and interior restrooms.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located just south of I-215 in Green Valley Corporate Center South. The building offers views of The Strip and Las Vegas Valley to the north and mountains to the south.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 2470 & 2490 Paseo Verde Parkway are two single-story buildings consisting of approximately ±113,401 rentable square feet located just south of the I-215 in Green Valley Corporate Center South. The property enjoys close proximity to Green Valley Ranch Resort, The District and McCarran International Airport while also offering stunning views of the Las Vegas Strip.

This single-story Class B office building was constructed in 2002 and total 36,844 square feet.  Providing excellent drive by visibility and signage opportunities, these buildings deliver the perfect opportunity for a large back office user.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Second generation space in a Class A building that includes a large executive boardroom, full kitchen, and view of the city. Perfect for large staffs as it also has 30 private offices, several open areas, a training room, break room, work room and storage.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 2651 Paseo Verde Parkway is located on the SE corner of Paseo Verde Pkwy and St. Rose Pkwy. 1 block south of the I-215 Beltway. It is a two-story professional office building with second floor 2nd generation space available for Lease. The space has beautiful views of the city to the North and West as well as Paseo Vista Park to the East. The building has great signage opportunities both on the building as well as a monument sign in front. There are several retail amenities and a park within walking distance of the building and numerous others in close driving district including The District a block to the East. 2651 Paseo Verde Pkwy is the perfect building in terms of quality, proximity to the beltway, and amenities nearby.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Second generation space in a Class A building that includes a large executive boardroom, full kitchen, and view of the city. Perfect for large staffs as it also has 30 private offices, several open areas, a training room, break room, work room and storage.
